Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Greenwood, due to police activity near 47th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Greenwood, due to police activity near 47th/Greenwood.

Eastbound #47 47th buses will operate via 47th, Drexel, 51st, Lake Park, 47th and over regular route.

Westbound #47 47th buses will operate via 47th, Lake Park, 51st, Drexel, 47th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
